member.name: T:GridForge.Blockers.Blocker
member.summary: Base class for all grid blockers that handles applying and removing obstacles.

member.summary: Unique token representing this blockage instance.

member.summary: Indicates whether the blocker is currently active.

member.summary: The cached minimum bounds of the blockage area.

member.summary: The cached maximum bounds of the blockage area.

member.summary: Tracks whether the blocker is currently blocking voxels.

member.summary: Flags whether or not to hold onto a reference of the voxels this blocker covers.

member.summary: The cached voxels this blocker is currently blocking if is true.

member.summary: Initializes a new blocker instance.
member.param: Flag whether or not this blocker will block on update.
Flag whether or not to cache covered voxels that are blocked.

member.name: M:GridForge.Blockers.Blocker.ToggleStatus(System.Boolean)
member.summary: Toggles the blocker from inactive to active or active to inactive state If object is currently blocking, the blocker will be removed. If object is not active and not blocking, the blocker will be applied.

member.name: M:GridForge.Blockers.Blocker.ApplyBlockage
member.summary: Applies the blockage by marking voxels as obstacles.

member.name: M:GridForge.Blockers.Blocker.RemoveBlockage
member.summary: Removes the blockage by clearing obstacle markers from voxels.

member.summary: Gets the min bounds of the area to block. Must be implemented by subclasses.

member.summary: Gets the max bounds of the area to block. Must be implemented by subclasses.

member.summary: A manually placed blocker that obstructs a defined bounding area.

member.summary: Initializes a new bounds blocker
member.param: The bounding area to block.

Flag whether or not to cache covered voxels.

member.summary: The center point of the grid's bounding volume.

member.summary: Indicates whether this grid configuration has been set.

The maximum boundary of the grid.
The size of scan cells within the grid. Default is 8.

member.summary: No linear direction from source

member.name: T:GridForge.Grids.GlobalGridManager
member.summary: Manages a collection of interconnected grids to support large or dynamic worlds. Handles grid storage, retrieval, and spatial hashing for fast lookups.

member.summary: Maximum number of grids that can be managed.

member.name: F:GridForge.Grids.GlobalGridManager.DefaultVoxelSize
member.summary: The default size of each grid voxel in world units.

member.summary: The default size of a spatial hash cell used for grid lookup.

member.summary: The size of each grid voxel in world units.

member.name: P:GridForge.Grids.GlobalGridManager.SpatialGridCellSize
member.summary: The size of a spatial hash cell used for grid lookup.

member.name: F:GridForge.Grids.GlobalGridManager.VoxelResolution
member.summary: Resolution for snapping or searching within the grid (half of VoxelSize).

member.name: P:GridForge.Grids.GlobalGridManager.ActiveGrids
member.summary: Collection of all active grids managed by the system.

member.summary: Dictionary mapping hashed bounds to grid indices to prevent duplicate grids.

member.summary: Dictionary mapping spatial hash keys to grid indices for fast lookups.

member.summary: The current version of the grid system, incremented on major changes.

member.summary: Predefined offsets for a 3x3x3 neighbor structure, excluding the center position.

member.name: F:GridForge.Grids.GlobalGridManager._gridLock
member.summary: Lock for managing concurrent access to grid operations. Ensures thread safety for read/write operations.

member.name: F:GridForge.Grids.GlobalGridManager.OnActiveGridChange
member.summary: Event triggers when grid is added or removed. Allows external systems to react to the active grid mutation.

member.name: F:GridForge.Grids.GlobalGridManager.OnReset
member.summary: Event triggered when the GlobalGridManager is reset. Allows external systems to react to a full grid wipe.

member.name: T:GridForge.Grids.ScanCell
member.summary: Represents a spatial partition within a grid, managing occupants at a finer granularity than grid voxels. Handles efficient tracking, retrieval, and removal of occupants within a designated scan cell area.

member.name: P:GridForge.Grids.ScanCell.GridIndex
member.summary: The global index of the grid this scan cell belongs to.

member.name: P:GridForge.Grids.ScanCell.CellKey
member.summary: A unique identifier for this scan cell in the grid, derived from spatial hashing.

member.name: P:GridForge.Grids.ScanCell.SpawnToken
member.summary: Unique token identifying this scan cell instance.

member.name: F:GridForge.Grids.ScanCell._voxelOccupants
member.summary: Maps a to a bucket of associated instances.

member.name: P:GridForge.Grids.ScanCell.CellOccupantCount
member.summary: The total number of occupants in this scan cell.

member.name: P:GridForge.Grids.ScanCell.IsAllocated
member.summary: Indicates whether this scan cell is currently allocated in the grid.

member.name: P:GridForge.Grids.ScanCell.IsOccupied
member.summary: Determines whether this scan cell is occupied by any occupants. A scan cell is only considered occupied if it is allocated and contains at least one occupant.

member.name: M:GridForge.Grids.ScanCell.Initialize(System.UInt16,System.Int32)
member.summary: Initializes the scan cell with the specified grid index and unique cell key.

member.name: M:GridForge.Grids.ScanCell.Reset
member.summary: Resets the scan cell, clearing all occupants and returning memory to object pools. This effectively marks the scan cell as deallocated and removes all references.

member.name: M:GridForge.Grids.ScanCell.AddOccupant(System.Int32,GridForge.Spatial.IVoxelOccupant,System.Int32@)
member.summary: Adds an occupant to this scan cell and tracks its presence.
member.param: The unique spawn token of the voxel where the occupant resides.
The occupant instance to add.
member.returns: An integer ticket representing the occupant's position in the data structure.

member.name: M:GridForge.Grids.ScanCell.TryRemoveOccupant(System.Int32,GridForge.Spatial.IVoxelOccupant)
member.summary: Removes an occupant from this scan cell.
member.param: The spawn token of the voxel the occupant was assigned to.
member.returns: True if the occupant was successfully removed; otherwise, false.

member.name: M:GridForge.Grids.ScanCell.GetOccupants
member.summary: Retrieves all occupants associated with this ScanCell.
member.returns: An enumerable of occupants within this scan cell.

member.name: M:GridForge.Grids.ScanCell.GetConditionalOccupants(System.Func{System.Byte,System.Boolean})
member.summary: Retrieves occupants whose group Ids match a given condition.

member.name: M:GridForge.Grids.ScanCell.GetOccupantsFor(System.Int32)
member.summary: Retrieves all occupants associated with a specific voxel spawn token within this scan cell.
member.param: The unique spawn key of the voxel.
member.returns: An enumerable collection of occupants assigned to the voxel.

member.name: M:GridForge.Grids.ScanCell.TryGetOccupantAt(System.Int32,System.Int32,GridForge.Spatial.IVoxelOccupant@)
member.summary: Attempts to retrieve a specific occupant in this scan cell using a voxel's spawn key and occupant ticket.
member.param: The spawn key of the voxel the occupant belongs to.
The unique ticket identifying the occupant.
The retrieved occupant if found.
member.returns: True if the occupant was found, otherwise false.

member.name: T:GridForge.Grids.Voxel
member.summary: Represents a voxel within a 3D grid, handling spatial positioning, obstacles, occupants, and neighbor relationships.

member.name: P:GridForge.Grids.Voxel.SpawnToken
member.summary: Unique token identifying this voxel instance.

member.name: P:GridForge.Grids.Voxel.GlobalIndex
member.summary: The global and local coordinates of this voxel within the grid system.

member.name: P:GridForge.Grids.Voxel.GridIndex
member.summary: The global index of the grid this voxel belongs to.

member.name: P:GridForge.Grids.Voxel.Index
member.summary: The local coordinates of this voxel within its grid.

member.name: P:GridForge.Grids.Voxel.ScanCellKey
member.summary: The spatial hash key of the scan cell that this voxel belongs to.

member.name: P:GridForge.Grids.Voxel.WorldPosition
member.summary: The world-space position of this voxel.

member.name: F:GridForge.Grids.Voxel._isNeighborCacheValid
member.summary: Indicates whether the neighbor cache is valid.

member.name: F:GridForge.Grids.Voxel._cachedNeighbors
member.summary: Cached array of neighboring voxels for fast lookup representing a 3x3x3 linear direction grid
member.remarks: Unlike Grid adjacency (which is 1:many), voxels can only have 1 neighbor in any one direction (1:1).

member.name: P:GridForge.Grids.Voxel.ObstacleTracker
member.summary: Stores a unique hash value for each obstacle added to this voxel to prevent adding duplicates

member.summary: The current number of obstacles on this voxel.

member.name: P:GridForge.Grids.Voxel.OccupantCount
member.summary: The current number of occupants on this voxel.

member.summary: Determines whether this voxel is occupied by entities.

member.summary: Checks if this voxel has open slots for new occupants.

member.summary: Represents a 3D grid structure for spatial organization, managing voxels and scan cells. Handles initialization, neighbor relationships, and occupancy tracking.

member.summary: Unique token identifying the grid instance.

member.summary: Global index of the grid within the world.

member.summary: Count of currently linked neighboring grids.

member.name: M:GridForge.Grids.VoxelGrid.NotifyBoundaryChange(GridForge.Grids.LinearDirection)
member.summary: Notifies only the relevant boundary voxels when a neighboring grid is added or removed. Instead of looping through all voxels, it targets specific boundary rows or columns.
member.param: The direction of the affected boundary.

member.name: M:GridForge.Grids.VoxelGrid.IsOnBoundary(GridForge.Spatial.VoxelIndex)
member.summary: Determines if a voxel coordinate is at the boundary of the grid. Used to determine if a voxel should update when a neighboring grid is added/removed.

member.summary: Checks whether a given position falls within the grid bounds.

member.name: M:GridForge.Grids.VoxelGrid.IsGridOverlapValid(GridForge.Grids.VoxelGrid,GridForge.Grids.VoxelGrid,FixedMathSharp.Fixed64)
member.summary: Checks if two grids are overlapping within a given tolerance threshold. This is used to determine if grids should be linked as neighbors.
member.param: The first grid.
The second grid.
Optional tolerance to account for minor floating-point errors.
member.returns: True if the grids overlap within the tolerance, otherwise false.

member.summary: Retrieves all neighboring grids connected to this grid.

member.summary: The index of the grid in .

member.name: T:GridForge.Spatial.IVoxelOccupant
member.summary: Represents an entity that can occupy a . Occupants can be dynamic entities such as units or items (obstacles).

member.name: P:GridForge.Spatial.IVoxelOccupant.OccupantGroupId
member.summary: The group Id used for grouping occupants within a scan cell. Occupants with the same group Id belong to the same logical group. This allows efficient retrieval of related occupants in spatial queries.

member.name: P:GridForge.Spatial.IVoxelOccupant.IsVoxelOccupant
member.summary: Flag used to determine if occupant is current occupying a voxel

member.name: P:GridForge.Spatial.IVoxelOccupant.OccupantTicket
member.summary: A unique ticket identifier assigned when this occupant is added to a scan cell. Used for efficient tracking and removal.

member.name: P:GridForge.Spatial.IVoxelOccupant.WorldPosition
member.summary: The absolute world-space position of the occupant, representing its precise location in the environment.

member.name: P:GridForge.Spatial.IVoxelOccupant.GlobalIndex
member.summary: The global grid coordinates of the this occupant is being added to.

member.summary: Represents a partition within a that modifies its behavior. Partitions can define special attributes or metadata for a voxel, such as terrain type or navigation properties.

member.summary: The global index of the parent voxel where this partition is attached.

member.summary: Flag to determine if this partition is currently attached to a

member.summary: Called when adding this partition to a .

member.summary: Called when this partition is removed from a . Cleans up any associated data.

member.name: T:GridForge.Spatial.PartitionProvider`1
member.summary: Provides efficient storage and retrieval of partitions keyed by integer values, supporting type-safe queries and management of partitioned data.

member.summary: Backing dictionary that stores partition instances keyed by integer identifiers.

member.name: P:GridForge.Spatial.PartitionProvider`1.Partitions
member.summary: Returns an enumerable of all partitions currently stored in the provider.

member.summary: Indicates whether the provider currently contains any partitions. Returns true if empty; otherwise, false.

member.name: P:GridForge.Spatial.PartitionProvider`1.Count
member.summary: Gets the current number of partitions stored in the provider.

member.name: M:GridForge.Spatial.PartitionProvider`1.TryAdd(System.Int32,`0)
member.summary: Attempts to add a partition to the provider with the specified key. Returns true if the partition was added; false if a partition with the same key already exists.

member.name: M:GridForge.Spatial.PartitionProvider`1.TryRemove(System.Int32,`0@)
member.summary: Attempts to remove a partition associated with the specified key. If successful, the removed partition is returned in the out parameter. Returns true if the partition was removed; otherwise, false.

member.name: M:GridForge.Spatial.PartitionProvider`1.TryGet``1(System.Int32,``0@)
member.summary: Attempts to retrieve a partition of the specified type associated with the given key. Returns true and sets the out parameter if the partition exists and is of the requested type; otherwise, returns false.

member.name: M:GridForge.Spatial.PartitionProvider`1.Has``1(System.Int32)
member.summary: Determines whether the provider contains a partition of the specified type associated with the given key. Returns true if such a partition exists; otherwise, false.

member.name: M:GridForge.Spatial.PartitionProvider`1.Clear
member.summary: Removes all partitions from the provider, clearing its internal storage.

member.summary: Returns a string representation of the coordinates.

member.name: M:GridForge.Spatial.VoxelIndex.GetHashCode

member.summary: Provides a configurable logging system for GridForge with support for log levels, formatting, and file output.

member.summary: Represents the severity level of a log message.

member.summary: Delegate for handling log messages. Defaults to .

member.summary: Delegate for custom log formatting. Defaults to .

member.summary: Gets or sets the file path for logging. If null, file logging is disabled.

member.summary: Gets or sets the minimum log level required for messages to be logged.

member.summary: Synchronization lock for thread-safe logging.

member.name: M:GridForge.GridForgeLogger.DefaultLogHandler(GridForge.GridForgeLogger.LogLevel,System.String,System.String)
member.summary: The default handler for logging messages, writing them to the console and optionally to a file.

The log message.
The source of the log message (e.g., calling method).

member.summary: The default log formatter that formats log messages with timestamp, log level, and source information.
member.param: The severity level of the log message.
The log message.
The source of the log message (e.g., calling method).
member.returns: A formatted log entry as a string.

member.summary: Logs an informational message.
member.param: The message to log.
The calling method name, automatically captured.
The calling file name, automatically captured to get the class name.

member.summary: Logs a warning message.
member.param: The warning message to log.
The calling method name, automatically captured.
The calling file name, automatically captured to get the class name.

member.name: M:GridForge.GridForgeLogger.Error(System.String,System.Exception,System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Logs an error message, optionally including an exception stack trace.

An optional exception whose details will be included in the log.
The calling method name, automatically captured.
The calling file name, automatically captured to get the class name.

member.name: T:GridForge.Utility.GridVoxelSet
member.summary: Used to group query results on a grid to voxel level

member.name: F:GridForge.Utility.GridVoxelSet.Grid
member.summary: The grid containing the voxels from the resulting query

member.name: F:GridForge.Utility.GridVoxelSet.Voxels
member.summary: A list of voxels that match the provided query

member.name: T:GridForge.Utility.GridTracer
member.summary: Provides utilities for tracing lines or bounding areas in a grid, aligning them to grid voxels. Uses fixed-point calculations to ensure deterministic and accurate grid traversal.

member.name: M:GridForge.Utility.GridTracer.TraceLine(FixedMathSharp.Vector3d,FixedMathSharp.Vector3d,System.Double,System.Boolean)
member.summary: Traces a 3D line between two points in the grid. The traced points are returned as grid voxels.
member.remarks: Uses a fractional step algorithm inspired by Bresenham’s line algorithm. This implementation leverages fixed-point math to maintain precision across a deterministic grid.
member.param: Starting position in world space.
Ending position in world space.
Value applied to the start/end positions before snapping.
Whether to include the end voxel in the traced line.
member.returns: A collection of objects representing the traced path.

member.name: M:GridForge.Utility.GridTracer.TraceLine(FixedMathSharp.Vector2d,FixedMathSharp.Vector2d,System.Double,System.Boolean)
member.summary: Traces a 2D line between two points, snapping them to grid coordinates.
member.remarks: This method projects the 2D line onto the X-Y plane and follows the closest grid-aligned path.
member.param: Starting 2D position.
Ending 2D position.
Value applied to the start/end positions before snapping.
Whether to include the end voxel.
member.returns: A collection of objects representing the traced path.

member.name: M:GridForge.Utility.GridTracer.GetCoveredVoxels(FixedMathSharp.Vector3d,FixedMathSharp.Vector3d,System.Double)
member.summary: Retrieves all grid voxels covered by the given bounding area.
member.param: The minimum corner of the bounding area.
The maximum corner of the bounding area.
Value applied to the min/max bounds before snapping.

member.name: M:GridForge.Utility.GridTracer.GetCoveredScanCells(FixedMathSharp.Vector3d,FixedMathSharp.Vector3d,System.Double)
member.summary: Retrieves all scan cells within the given bounding area across relevant grids.
member.param: The minimum corner of the bounding area.
The maximum corner of the bounding area.
Value applied to the min/max bounds before snapping.
member.returns: An enumerable of covered scan cells grouped by grid.

member.name: T:PartitionExtensions
member.summary: Provides extension methods for managing instances on objects. This allows adding and removing partitions while maintaining their state.

member.name: M:PartitionExtensions.AddToVoxel(GridForge.Spatial.IVoxelPartition,GridForge.Grids.Voxel)
member.summary: Attaches a partition to a specified , updating its state and invoking initialization logic.
member.param: The partition to attach.
The target voxel where the partition will be added.

member.name: M:PartitionExtensions.RemoveFromVoxel(GridForge.Spatial.IVoxelPartition,GridForge.Grids.Voxel)
member.summary: Detaches a partition from a specified , resetting its state and invoking cleanup logic.
member.param: The partition to detach.
The target voxel from which the partition will be removed.
